name: BMW M8
blurb: The M8 blends motorsport heritage with modern electrification. It channels BMW’s high-performance DNA into an all-electric gran tourer—sculpted for efficiency, engineered for power, and designed to deliver grand touring comfort without sacrificing thrill.

name: Ferrari LaFerrari
blurb: LaFerrari is a celebration of hybrid performance technology developed for Formula 1. Its V12 engine paired with an electric motor delivers instant torque and precision, wrapped in a design that blends Italian craftsmanship with aerodynamic purpose.

name: Ford Shelby Mustang
blurb: The Shelby Mustang brings iconic American muscle into the electric age. With hand-finished interiors, adaptive cruise technology and precise handling, it combines raw power with executive-class comfort for long-distance journeys.

name: Lamborghini Revuelto
blurb: Revuelto captures the spirit of Lamborghini with hybrid innovation and aggressive design. Built for dynamic terrains, its lightweight carbon chassis, torque vectoring AWD and adaptive suspension make it fearless on and off the road.

name: Mercedes AMG ONE
blurb: The AMG ONE brings Formula 1 technology to the road with its hybrid drivetrain derived from Mercedes-AMG’s championship cars. It represents a bold vision—where aerodynamics, electric intelligence and motorsport engineering meet everyday usability.
